text: waldhyn astajabuu lirabihim hin deahm 'iilaa twhydh wtaeth, wa'aqamuu alsalat almafrudat bhdwdha fi awqatha, wa'iidha 'araduu amrana tshawru fyh, wamimaa aetynahm min al'amwal ytsdqwn fi sabil allh, wywdwn ma farad allah ealayhim min alhuquq lahlha min zakat wnfqt waghayr dhlk min wujuh al'infaq
